sentences.en: Admiring the trivia greaty , the man with sunglasses pressed the button again and again.
sentences.cn: 戴墨镜的男子对这个豆知识感佩万分,一直连按按钮.

sentences.en: Brennan is measuring pitchforks and spraying them with luminal as Booth shows Gavin the bamboo - framed sunglasses.
sentences.cn: Brennan检查干草叉和喷涂鲁米液.

sentences.en: Chanel sunglasses are all of high quality and the latest fashion.
sentences.cn: 夏奈尔墨镜的都是高品质和最新的时尚.

sentences.en: He had to wear sunglasses because of the glare of the sun.
sentences.cn: 因为阳光耀眼,他只好戴墨镜.

sentences.en: He was also shown on horseback in sunglasses, gloves and a body - hugging white vest.
sentences.cn: 其中还有普京总统戴着墨镜 、 手套,穿着紧身白背心骑马的照片.

sentences.en: Her eyes were masked by huge round sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 她的双眼被一副圆形大墨镜遮住了.

sentences.en: I can’t see her eyes, but I can see her eyebrows above the sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 我看不到她的眼睛，但是能看到她露在太阳镜上面的眉毛。

sentences.en: I wore sunglasses all the time and people thought it was an affectation.
sentences.cn: 我成天戴着墨镜，大家都觉得我在装酷。

sentences.en: It'stopped and a tall fair man with sunglasses got out.
sentences.cn: 比尔暗自微笔,开始觉得不那么着急了.

sentences.en: Look carefully. What about the one who is wearing sunglasses?
sentences.cn: 仔细看看. 戴墨镜的那个人是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many people were wearing sunglasses under the dazzling sunlight.
sentences.cn: 在刺目的阳光下,很多人戴着墨镜.

sentences.en: She slipped on a pair of sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 她轻快地戴上了一副太阳镜。

sentences.en: The celebrity was disguised in black sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 这位明星戴着大黑超以掩饰自己.

sentences.en: The girl often wears a pair of sunglasses, and she looks very cool.
sentences.cn: 那个姑娘经常戴着墨镜, 看起来很酷.

sentences.en: The sunglasses that compares flat nose what to look take is bit better?
sentences.cn: 比较扁的鼻子带什么样子的墨镜好点?

sentences.en: What color should I choose for my sunglasses?
sentences.cn: 我该挑一副什么颜色的太阳镜呢？

sentences.en: What do you think of my new sunglasses?
sentences.cn: 你觉得我的新太阳镜怎么样？

sentences.en: Why always do you put on the sunglasses?

trans.tran_en: dark glasses that you wear to protect your eyes when the sun is very bright
dark glasses that you wear to protect your eyes when the sun is very bright
